items.sentence: I already knew Tom was planning on doing that.
How did you know that Tom knew how to do that?
How did you know that I wanted you to do that?
How did Tom know Mary wasn't going to do that?
Everybody knows that Tom won't really do that.
Don't forget that Tom can't do that very well.
Does Tom know you want to do that before 2:30?
Do you think that you can do that by yourself?
A Canadian would never do something like that.
No matter what happens, you have to stay calm.
